title: Google’s Fit, Moto’s RAZR, and who the hell is BBK??? Featuring Andru Edwards from Gear Live!
description: Adam and Joe are joined by Andru Edwards, host of the Geared Up Podcast to talk about the Google Pixel. The battery is small, but people are buying it anyway. We take a look at one of the best deals in phones in 2019, the LG G8x. Samsung may lose its top spot in smartphone shipments - kinda. Google is getting healthy with Fitbit in its fold, and speaking of folding, holy cow those Moto RAZR photos are hawt! Visit http://www.andauth.co/PodcastPicks to see our Amazon Store! Affiliate disclosure: We may receive compensation in connection with your purchase of products via links on this page. The compensation received will never influence the content, topics or posts made on this podcast. Recorded 11/01/19 Topics: How to enable RCS messaging on your phone, regardless of carrier DJI Mavic Mini hands-on: The perfect drone for people who haven’t used a drone Battery be damned, people are buying the Google Pixel 4 anyway LG G8X ThinQ review: A more practical — and affordable — ‘folding’ phone Parent company of OnePlus, Oppo could soon surpass Samsung as top dog Breaking: Google parent company Alphabet reportedly in talks to buy Fitbit Foldable Motorola Razr revival phone leaks The Android Authority podcast is: Adam Doud - @DeadTechnology Jonathan Feist - @JFeist1 / @DroneRushcom Joe Hindy - @ThatJoeHindy Produced by Adam Doud Special Guest appearance by: Andru Edwards - @AndruEdwardsHost, Geared Up Podcast Check out the other podcasts in our network! html:
Nov 2, 2019

Adam and Joe are joined by Andru Edwards, host of the Geared Up Podcast to talk about the Google Pixel. The battery is small, but people are buying it anyway. We take a look at one of the best deals in phones in 2019, the LG G8x. Samsung may lose its top spot in smartphone shipments - kinda. Google is getting healthy with Fitbit in its fold, and speaking of folding, holy cow those Moto RAZR photos are hawt!

Visit http://www.andauth.co/PodcastPicks to see our Amazon Store!

Affiliate disclosure: We may receive compensation in connection with your purchase of products via links on this page. The compensation received will never influence the content, topics or posts made on this podcast.

Recorded 11/01/19

Topics:

How to enable RCS messaging on your phone, regardless of carrier

DJI Mavic Mini hands-on: The perfect drone for people who haven’t used a drone

Battery be damned, people are buying the Google Pixel 4 anyway

LG G8X ThinQ review: A more practical — and affordable — ‘folding’ phone

Parent company of OnePlus, Oppo could soon surpass Samsung as top dog

Breaking: Google parent company Alphabet reportedly in talks to buy Fitbit

Foldable Motorola Razr revival phone leaks

The Android Authority podcast is:

Adam Doud - @DeadTechnology

Jonathan Feist - @JFeist1 / @DroneRushcom

Joe Hindy - @ThatJoeHindy

Produced by Adam Doud

Special Guest appearance by:

Andru Edwards - @AndruEdwards
Host, Geared Up Podcast

Check out the other podcasts in our network!

The SoundGuys Podcast
